meanings.definition: relating to or produced by a photostat machine
meanings.sent1: The photostatic image was clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She used a photostatic copy of the document for her presentation.
meanings.sent3: The photostatic paper seemed to have a mind of its own, always getting jammed in the machine.
meanings.sent4: His photostatic memory captured every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The photostatic light illuminated the room, revealing hidden corners.

meanings.definition: a copy made by a photostat machine
meanings.sent1: He handed her a photostatic of the contract to review.
meanings.sent2: The photostatic was a perfect replica of the original document.
meanings.sent3: The photostatic sat on the desk, waiting to be filed away.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a photostatic, duplicating memories with precision.
meanings.sent5: The photostatic held all the information needed for the case.
